## PoolingService.destroy() method

Destroy a resource from the pool

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
destroy(resource: T): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  resource | T | Resource instance to be destroyed |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
